casebody.data:
CARLO VONA ET AL. v. EDWARD N. LERNER ET AL. The Court (FORD, MURRAY and LICARI, Js.) Thomas E. Minogue, Jr., in support of the petition. *939Mary A. Gambardella, Frederick L. Murolo and Karen T. Gerber, in opposition. Decided January 17, 2003

CHIEF JUSTICE SULLIVAN and JUSTICES BORDEN, NORCOTT, KATZ, PALMER and VERTEFEUILLE and JUDGES MULCAHY and SUSCO did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
